blocks.content: 4.2 Multi-AI Collaboration
Foundational Principles (for Beginners)

items: Flow before tools: define deliverables and validation first, then choose the AI.
Iterate in small steps: validate exactly one critical assumption per step (speed / cost / UX / accuracy).
Layered responsibilities: discovery & verification (Perplexity) / structured outputs (ChatGPT / Claude) / implementation (Cursor / Codex / Copilot) / design & assets (Figma AI / Canva / MJ / SD).
Traceable & reproducible: keep sources, versions, prompts, and data samples; prefer SOPs and templating.

blocks.content: At-a-Glance: Multi-AI Pipeline (text overview)

Information scan (Perplexity) → Architecture & framing (ChatGPT / Claude) → Task breakdown (Notion AI) → Coding & testing (Cursor / Codex / Copilot) → Visuals & assets (Figma AI / Canva / Midjourney / SD / Runway) → Content & narration (ChatGPT / Gemini / Whisper / ElevenLabs) → Automation & orchestration (Zapier / Make / LangChain / MCP) → Monitoring & iteration (Analytics + ChatGPT analysis)
Tool Positioning Matrix (Overview)

blocks.title: Text Generation & Structuring AI
rows: Structured outputs, system design, test scaffolding
Requirement framing, interview scripts, PRD outlines
Mixed media learning content, multilingual content
Asset usage rights must be reviewed

blocks.title: Design & Multimedia AI
rows: UI first drafts and promo assets

blocks.title: Automation & Orchestration AI
rows: Interoperability across models and data sources

blocks.content: Practical Workflow (Task-Tracker App)

items: Information scan: Perplexity compiles 3–5 recent trends and competitors with sources.
Architecture: ChatGPT / Claude output “Problem → User → 3 core features → MVP metrics → Risks”.
Task breakdown: Notion AI generates a 2-week sprint board (backend / frontend / test / design).
Dev & test: Cursor builds project scaffold; Codex generates feature modules; Copilot assists refactoring and tests.
Design & assets: Figma AI for wireframes; Canva for posters; Midjourney / SD for illustrations; Runway for shorts.
Localization: ChatGPT / Gemini for multilingual copy; Whisper for subtitles; ElevenLabs for narration.
Automation & launch: Zapier / Make wire up forms / Slack / Email; LangChain orchestrates ChatGPT + Claude + retrieval; MCP manages context access.
Monitoring & iteration: collect W2 retention / D1 revisit / feature usage; ChatGPT proposes improvements.

blocks.content: Large-Scale Concept: Cross-Language AI Tutor Marketplace

Vision: connect global tutors and learners; the platform automatically converts syllabi, generates multilingual content, produces video explanations, powers real-time Q&A, and grades assignments. Tutors focus on teaching quality; the platform handles matching, content transformation, and automated operations.
Phases & AI Collaboration
Cross-Tool Prompt Templates (ready to use)

blocks.title: 1) Market scan (Perplexity)
blocks.content:
Query: "online tutor marketplace trends 2024..2025 pricing models retention benchmarks"
Output: table of major trends, business models, and key KPIs (CAC, W2, ARPU), each row with source links.

blocks.title: 2) PRD drafting (Claude)
blocks.content: Organize a PRD using: Problem → Users → Scope → User stories → Non-functional requirements (performance / privacy) → Success metrics → Not-doing list. Input: {{research summary + needs}}

blocks.title: 3) Scaffolding (Cursor / Codex)
blocks.content: Generate APIs and frontend pages for five services: courses, materials, assignments, grading, payments. Tech: backend {{FastAPI/Express}}, frontend {{Next.js/React}}, DB {{PostgreSQL}}; include minimal unit-test samples.

blocks.title: 4) Refactor & test (Copilot)
blocks.content:
Refactor the function below into a pure function and add edge-case tests (coverage ≥80%); note potential performance bottlenecks:
```ts
{{code}}
```

blocks.title: 5) Multilingual copy (ChatGPT / Gemini)
blocks.content: Produce EN / ZH-Hant / JP variants using “one-line value prop + three feature bullets + CTA”, ≤60 chars per language. Topic: {{platform summary}}

blocks.title: 6) Video & narration (Whisper / ElevenLabs / Runway)
blocks.content: Convert this teaching script into subtitles and narration (tone: friendly, clear; speed: medium). Then output a ≤60-sec short script for Runway generation. Input: {{script}}

blocks.title: 7) Automation flow (Zapier / Make)
blocks.content: Trigger: new student registration → Actions: create Notion row, send welcome email, add to Slack #students, assign tutor.

blocks.title: 8) Multi-model orchestration (LangChain + MCP)
blocks.content: Pipeline: ChatGPT parses syllabus → Perplexity retrieves sources → Claude drafts materials → Gemini produces illustrations → Whisper/ElevenLabs generate AV assets. Use MCP to unify access to documents and vector indexes.
Notes on New Tools: Kuse / Codex

definitions.definition: A multimodal knowledge canvas for text, images, video, and PDFs in one space; AI assists analysis and organization. Suited to research and early ideation.
A coding agent that can implement features, fix issues, and open PRs—useful automation alongside Cursor / Copilot.
A protocol for secure model access to external resources/tools, improving context sharing and permission governance in multi-tool setups.

blocks.content: Governance & Compliance (minimal checklist)

definitions.definition: Collect and process only necessary fields; de-identify or keep sensitive data on-device.
Preserve Perplexity citations; include references and timestamps in reports.
Confirm commercial rights for generated images and fonts; avoid protected IP.
Set monthly API limits; migrate high-cost jobs to batch/offline processing.

blocks.content: Validation Metrics (recommended)

blocks.title: Summary
blocks.content: The core of multi-AI collaboration is the **process**, not a single tool: discovery & verification → structure & specs → coding & tests → design & assets → content & localization → automation & launch → monitoring & iteration. Ship the minimal pipeline first, then progressively upgrade tools and automation depth.
